string.text: 9x18 APS Magazine

A standard APS magazine chambered in 9x18mm designed for the APS machine pistol. It is constructed from steel with a blued finish, providing reliable feeding and durability. The single-stack design allows for a slim profile but may be prone to wear under heavy use. The magazine features an ergonomic base plate for better handling. Manufactured by TsNIITochMash in Russia.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES: %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] firearm component
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] handgun magazine
Modified 9x19 APS Magazine

A modified APS magazine chambered in 9x19mm. It is made from steel with a blued finish, offering reliable feeding and robustness. The modification increases ammunition capacity but can result in compatibility issues with other firearms. Ergonomic base plates enhance handling and rapid reloading. Manufactured by TsNIITochMash in Russia.

 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] handgun magazine
9x19 Beretta 92F Magazine

A standard Beretta 92F magazine chambered in 9x19mm designed for the Beretta 92F pistol. It is constructed from stainless steel, ensuring reliable feeding and durability. The double-stack design provides optimal capacity but can be affected by debris. The magazine features an ergonomic base plate and textured sides for improved handling. Manufactured by Beretta in Italy.

Modified 9x18 Beretta 92F Magazine

A modified Beretta 92F magazine chambered in 9x18mm. It is made from stainless steel, ensuring reliable feeding and robustness. The modification changes ammunition compatibility but can reduce feeding reliability. The magazine includes an ergonomic base plate and textured sides for better handling. Manufactured by Beretta in Italy.

.45 ACP Colt 1911 Magazine

A standard Colt 1911 magazine chambered in .45 ACP designed for the Colt 1911 pistol. It is constructed from stainless steel, providing reliable feeding and robust construction. The single-stack design maintains a slim profile but limits ammunition capacity. The polished surface and anti-tilt follower ensure smooth operation. Manufactured by Colt's Manufacturing Company in the USA.

Manufactured by Kimber Manufacturing in the USA.
